Author: livipup
Text: I think if you consistently worry about eating too much when eating normal amounts of food that's a good sign. Like if eating is psychologically stressful.

Author: blackplumsummer
Text: Seeing signs in other people is not the same as diagnosing yourself! For example, if I see a friend start to ban entire groups of food (IE carbs) and also skip meals, and if I know they struggle with anxiety or depression, I might worry about them. But diagnosing yourself would be more "my weight is one of the most important measures of how I feel about myself." If you're worried I would recommend talking to your doctor about your concerns
